line1: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
line2: Jackdaws love my big sphinx of quartz
line3: How vexingly quick daft zebras jump
line4: The five boxing wizards jump quickly
line5: Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs
line6: To be, or not to be, that is the question
line7: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players
line8: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed
line9: I wandered lonely as a cloud
line10: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times
